Greeting.Message: Welcome Sir! Im glad you join us %player.
A DSA member joined the server.
Always nice to see a Widowmaker, %player.

Answers.Answer: Kudos to Howell, Home of the dedicated server.
Don't fall down in front of him.
Deadly at close range. Ignore him at 800. Well, mostly.
The DarkStar Alliance Merc Regiment! We do MWWL.
DarkStar Alliance Mercenaries Force! We are recruiting.
DarkStar Alliance Mercenaries Force! Elite Firepower for good money.
DarkStar Alliance. We are Mercs and proud of it.
DarkStar Alliance! 'cause money rules the world.
The coolest programming language in the world. I am written in it!
IS weapons only allowed on IS mechs and Clan weapons only allowed on Clan mechs.
Mixtech means that any weapon is allowed on any mech.

Statements.Statement: You have to get along with snipers, though you don't have to like them.
A good jump sniper is worth his weight in Teflon.
Stop arguing about poptarts. They have their uses. Sometimes.
Oh no, not that discussion.
Clan Streaks are extremely agile, locking quickly onto a target and tracking it until impact.
If the targeting reticule is red when SSRM's are launched, they will track accurately.
SSRMS generate more heat than Standard SRM's but inflict greater damage.!
FLEA: IS tech, 20T. Very small shape, high speed, low firepower, very low threat.
OSIRIS: IS tech, 30T. High speed, energy capable, low threat.
RAVEN: IS tech, 35T. High speed, full electronic, low firepower, low direct threat.
OWENS: IS tech, 35T. High speed but low firepower, low threat.
WOLFHOUND: IS tech, 35T. Good speed, good electronic, good energy loadout, medium threat.
CHIMERA: IS tech, 40T. Good speed, JJ capable, mixed loadout, fragile, low threat.
HELLSPAWN: IS tech, 45T. Good speed, ECM and JJ capable, low firepower, low threat.
HUNCHBACK: IS tech, 50T. Good speed, ECM capable, good firepower, medium threat.
UZIEL: IS tech, 50T. Good speed, JJ capable, medium thread.
BUSHWACKER: IS tech, 55T. Small shape, strong structure, good firepower, medium threat.
ARGUS: IS tech, 60T. Small shape and good firepower, no electronic, medium threat.
DRAGON: IS tech, 60T. Fast, good firepower, ECM capable, medium threat.
CATAPULT: IS tech, 65T. Support missile platform, JJ and BAP capable, medium threat.
THANATOS: IS tech, 75T. Dangerous from medium to close range, high threat.
BLACK KNIGHT: IS tech, 75T. Omnimech, full electronic, JJ capable, very high threat.
AWESOME: IS tech, 80T. Energy mech, no electronic, medium threat.
VICTOR: IS tech, 80T. Dangerous at any range, ECM and JJ capable, high threat.
ZEUS: IS tech, 80T. Good weapons loadout but big shape, medium threat.
TEMPLAR: IS tech, 85T. Good long range firepower, high threat.
LONGBOW: IS tech, 85T. Missile platform, BAP capable, slow and easy target, medium threat.
MAULER: IS tech, 90T. Highly armored, mixed loadout, low payload for the weight, high threat.
HIGHLANDER: IS tech, 90T. Dangerous at any range, high threat.
SUNDER: IS text, 90T. Very capable omnimech, ECM capable, high threat.
HAUPTMANN: IS tech, 95T. Heavy weapon loadout but slow and no electronic, high threat.
ATLAS: IS tech, 100T. Big shape, high long range firepower, full electronic, slow, very high threat.
FAFNIR: IS tech, 100T. Very powerful but extremly slow and easy target, ECM, high threat.
ULLER: Clan tech, 30T. Very small shape, low threat
COUGAR: Clan tech, 35T. Fast and good firepower, BAP and JJ capable, medium threat.
PUMA: Clan tech, 35T. Not fast for a light but good firepower, medium threat.
ARCTICFOX: Clan tech, 40T. Fast missiles capable omnimech, it can carry BAP, medium threat.
SHADOWCAT: Clan tech, 45T. Fast and agile omnimech, jets capable, good firepower, high threat.
Hellhound: Clan tech, 50T. Fast and versatile mech, ECM capable, high threat.
RYOKEN: Clan tech, 55T. Powerful omnimech, BAP and JJ capable, high threat.
VULTURE: Clan tech, 60T. Omnimech but mainly a missile platform, high threat.
CAULDRONBORN: Clan tech, 65T. Good and strong omnimech, BAP capable, high threat.
LOKI: Clan tech, 65T. Very versatile omnimech, top electronic, very fast, good firepower, very high threat.
THOR: Clan tech, 70T. Strong omnimech, dangerous at any range, ECM and JJ capable, very high threat.
NOVACAT: Clan tech, 70T. Omnimech but commonly seen with energy loadouts, weak arms, BAP capable, very high threat.
MADCAT: Clan tech, 75T. Versatile omnimech, dangerous at long range, BAP capable, high threat.
MASAKARI: Clan tech, 85T. Omnimech, very capable at any range, BAP capable, high threat.
MADCAT MK2: Clan tech, 90T. Omnimech, BAP and JJ capable, high threat.
GLADIATOR: Clan tech, 95T. Powerful omnimech, ECM, JJ and high loadout, very high threat.
DAISHI: Clan tech, 100T. Very high loadout but slow and easy target, high threat.
KODIAK: Clan tech, 100T. Powerful, high armor but easy target, ECM and JJ capable, high threat.
The ECM reduces enemy detection range.
The BAP Increases your detection range and reduces the missiles lock time
Anti missile laser turret, protects against guided missiles
